    • increaseSharedScore

      public void increaseSharedScore(int newPoints)
      increases the shared score counter by the int value newPoints
      Parameters:
      newPoints - The integer value indicates the number of points that need to be added to the shared score

    • updatePersonalScore

      public void updatePersonalScore()
      Updates the personal score based on the current state of the bookshelf and personal goal. If the calculated score is higher than the current personal score, it increases the personal score.
